title: At an intersection with a stop sign, when making a left hand turn, is it legal in NC to cross two lanes (ex: eastbound) of a median divided interstate highway then come to a complete stop in the median for the purpose of merging into (ex: westbound) oncoming traffic?  Or, should the driver wait at the intersection stop sign until able to cross lanes and completely merge into traffic without stopping?
